meanings.sent1: The flower petals showed turgescence after the rain.
meanings.sent2: Her cheeks had a turgescence look due to the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The balloon animals had a turgescence appearance that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the room created a turgescence atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The ripe fruit's turgescence color was a sign of its sweetness.

meanings.definition: The state of being turgid or swollen.
meanings.sent1: The turgescence of the river indicated heavy rainfall upstream.
meanings.sent2: His face showed turgescence after the allergic reaction.
meanings.sent3: The balloon's unexpected turgescence caused laughter at the party.
meanings.sent4: The turgescence of the clouds signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The turgescence of the balloon made it difficult to tie.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming swollen or distended.
meanings.sent1: The turgescence of the dough was a sign it was ready to bake.
meanings.sent2: The turgescence of the plant leaves indicated they were well-watered.
meanings.sent3: The sudden turgescence of the balloon startled the children.
meanings.sent4: The turgescence of the riverbanks showed the effects of the flood.
meanings.sent5: The turgescence of the sponge made it perfect for cleaning.
